website_summaries.verdict: Unlike some other trainers that treat the putting stroke like a 2D process, this arc trainer works in 3 dimensions.
pros: Provides a more natural training aid, as it works in 3 dimensions
Helps you to develop muscle memory on the putting green, so you can translate the proper putting stroke to the actual green
Works on the entire putting stroke from start to finish
Smart design that you're sure to love
cons: Bulkier than some other putting aids

customer_reviews.title: Not such effective
customer_reviews.text: I doubt how to improve putting skill using this tool, no such effective than expected.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: ... but it seems to be getting me in a good position with a consistent
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t transferred the action to the course yet but it seems to be getting me in a good position with a consistent stroke
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: N3P
customer_reviews.text: Can tell the difference in my putting on the course after using it half-a-dozen times. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maas

customer_reviews.title: Great putting help
customer_reviews.text: helps keep the putter on the correct line. A big putting aid!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Helpful !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to truly know the proper movement to maintain the correct arc !
customer_reviews.author: Roy L. Short

customer_reviews.title: Want to improve your putting?
customer_reviews.text: Easy piece of equipment to use. I have a habit of bringing the putter inside; the arc has dramatically improved my putting. I take it to the golf course with me daily.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product - not sure the mirror is entirely necessary, but still recommend to anyone interested in improving stroke path.
customer_reviews.author: Mdillon5

customer_reviews.title: #1 Way to lower your scores!
customer_reviews.text: This is # 1 best thing you can use to improve your putting !
customer_reviews.author: CBJones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using for a week. It seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: Rad doc 55

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to start practicing. Been wanting this swing aide for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Instructional Tool
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son needed to improve his putting. The golf coach suggested this item and the coach has mentioned that it's really helping my son.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Gaiennie

customer_reviews.title: birdies to be made. ..
customer_reviews.text: I had used a friend's before which inspired me to make this purchase. For the golfer using a heel shafted putter it is perfect to "feel" the proper release of the club head. Highly recommend this to the golfer looking to make more putts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This putter tool is incredibly easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This putter tool is incredibly easy to set up and use. Directions are easy to understand. The weight of the putting arc helps to keep it in place. I find that it works just as well on a carpet at the house as it does on an actual putting green.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Putting Arc
customer_reviews.text: Love the assistance it's giving me in improving my putting.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Keleman

product_meta.title: Golf Putting Arc MS-3D
product_meta.description: Yellow or black, and comes with mirror with adjustable slots on the MS. It is 33" and weighs 4 pounds. It is heavy enough to putt with it on carpet or floor, but also has holes in it if you want to station it on the green....but it is not necessary. We are the #1 most used putting training aid as rated by 130 of the top teaching pros in the USA.(2014 GRAA Magazine Survey)
feature_bullets: Putting is an arc, not straight back straight through
1200 professional wins,multiple wins in every professional major,
Can use the heal or the toe of your own putter-any putter will work
The Putting Arc will enable you to create a pure putting stroke in which the putter head moves on a three dimensional arc back while the face of the putter stays square to the putter path.
For rapid and continued improvement use the Putting Arc MS-3D for 5-10 minutes every day.
